projectsinfo.title: Video Games searcher
projectsinfo.description: A web application with React, API requests, local-storage, skeleton loading, filtering, favorites and react-router links.

projectsinfo.title: 21 blackjack
projectsinfo.description: BlackJack game for two players (user and computer) in JavaScript.

projectsinfo.title: Landing page in Bootstrap
projectsinfo.description: A landing page that look as close to the given design as possible with Sass and Bootstrap. Using pseudoclass nth-child to change some positions

projectsinfo.title: Awesome profile cards
projectsinfo.description: A Web application developed by a team of 4 women at Adalab's bootcamp that allows you to create and share personalized business cards. We inherited a Javascript code that we refactored to React, we created the web server and the database.

projectsinfo.title: Zomiga
projectsinfo.description: Design, shop implementation and management of a graphic designer's website.

projectsinfo.title: Stopwatch
projectsinfo.description: An interactive stopwatch in Neumorphism style with animations.

projectsinfo.title: Local weather
projectsinfo.description: A web App that displays the local weather using an API and user's geolocation.

projectsinfo.title: Rick and Morty
projectsinfo.description: Rick and Morty character directory througt API requests. Local-storage, react-router links and filters.

projectsinfo.title: Tic tac toe
projectsinfo.description: A functional tic-tac-toe 2 players game. Clip-paths figures, animations, show players turn, stop the game when there's no more movement and block them when there's a winner.
